body_html: Hmmm could you please comment a bit more on the performance characteristics of this solution that are lacking from the DynamicDAG? The algorithm generally is pretty solid, and generally it’s not necessarily true that insertions would become expensive. It’s also fundamentally an online solution with proofs of correctness, so it’s an appealing solution.

body: Hmmm could you please comment a bit more on the performance characteristics of this solution that are lacking from the DynamicDAG? The algorithm generally is pretty solid, and generally it’s not necessarily true that insertions would become expensive. It’s also fundamentally an online solution with proofs of correctness, so it’s an appealing solution.
